Info:
<color=green>Available Commands</color> :
<color=orange>/note info</color> : Shows info on version/author and commands
InfoOrdnungsamt: <color=orange>/note ordnungsamt</color> : Crafts a Regulatory Office Note
InfoSchiessstand: <color=orange>/note shootingrange</color> : Crafts a Shooting Range Letter

NoPermission: You do not have permission to use that command!
